sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); return (
{/* Logo and description */}
LockDeal

Buy Together, Save Smartly – Local Pickup, No Delivery

Join our community of smart shoppers and save on your purchases today!

{/* Quick links */}

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Login
  • Register
{/* For customers */}

For Customers

  • Browse Products
  • My Groups
  • How It Works
{/* For sellers */}

For Sellers

  • Seller Dashboard
  • Upload Products
  • Seller Guidelines

© {currentYear} LockDeal. All rights reserved.

Designed with ❤️ for smart shoppers and sellers

Facebook Instagram Twitter
); }; export default Footer;
